name: TexasRoadhouse
0:
”Alexa, ask Texas Roadhouse to put me on the waitlist”
”Alexa, ask Texas Roadhouse to add me to the waitlist”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: texas roadhouse
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alexa makes it easy to get on the waitlist at Texas Roadhouse!

With the Texas Roadhouse skill, just ask Alexa to put you on the waitlist. She’ll let you know which stores are closest to you and once you choose a location, she’ll ask a few questions, like how many are in your party and if you need a high chair. Please keep in mind, this is not a reservation, but a great way to reduce your wait at the restaurant during busy times.

So go ahead, ask Alexa to put you on the waitlist at Texas Roadhouse and soon you’ll be enjoying our Hand-Cut Steaks, Fall-Off-The-Bone Ribs, Made-From-Scratch Sides, Fresh-Baked Bread and Legendary Margaritas!
